metadata.synopsis: Balthazar indicates to the player that he is unable to talk while Nightsong isn't available to take part in the dialog
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Balthazar in the Shadowfell while Nightsong is unavailable

0.speaker: Balthazar
0.text: Hold your tongue for now. It is the Nightsong I need to speak with, not you.
0.context: NodeContext: Dismissive (A fallback line - Nightsong could be unavailable to speak to him for a number of gameplay reasons)
